prompt:
Task: For each ingredient, choose the best Woolworths SKU (from candidates) and suggest how many retail packs are needed.
        Use servings + archetype context to keep quantities realistic. If no candidate fits, set selected_product_id to null and explain in package_notes.
        Do NOT rewrite the instructions or mention retailer names in the method; only provide product matches.


        Meal draft:
        ```json
        {
  "name": "One-Pan Tomato Spinach Eggs on Toast",
  "description": "Quick stovetop eggs nestled in a mild tomato-spinach sauté, served over toasted bread with a sprinkle of feta. Simple, comforting, and ready fast for one.",
  "servings": "Single portion",
  "prep_steps": [
    "1. Finely chop red onion (about 2 tbsp).",
    "2. Mince garlic clove.",
    "3. Dice tomato.",
    "4. Rinse and drain spinach.",
    "5. Crumble feta (if using).",
    "6. Set out bread slices and a lidded skillet."
  ],
  "cook_steps": [
    "1. Heat olive oil in a small skillet over medium heat.",
    "2. Add red onion and sauté 1 minute until starting to soften; add garlic and cook 20–30 seconds until fragrant.",
    "3. Stir in tomato, a pinch of salt and pepper; cook 2–3 minutes until juicy.",
    "4. Add spinach and toss until just wilted, 30–60 seconds; level the mixture.",
    "5. Make two small wells and crack in eggs; season tops with a pinch of salt and pepper.",
    "6. Cover and cook 3–5 minutes until whites are set and yolks to your liking (lower heat if bubbling hard).",
    "7. While eggs cook, toast bread.",
    "8. Slide the tomato-spinach eggs over toast and sprinkle with feta. Serve immediately."
  ],
  "ingredients": [
    {
      "core_item_name": "olive oil",
      "quantity": "1 tbsp",
      "preparation": ""
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "red onion",
      "quantity": "2 tbsp",
      "preparation": "finely chopped"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "garlic",
      "quantity": "1 clove",
      "preparation": "minced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "tomato",
      "quantity": "1 medium",
      "preparation": "diced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "spinach",
      "quantity": "1 heaped cup",
      "preparation": ""
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "eggs",
      "quantity": "2 large",
      "preparation": ""
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "bread",
      "quantity": "1–2 slices",
      "preparation": "toasted"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "feta",
      "quantity": "2 tbsp",
      "preparation": "crumbled (optional)"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "salt and pepper",
      "quantity": "pinch",
      "preparation": "to taste"
    }
  ],
  "meal_tags": {
    "Diet": [
      "Flexitarian"
    ],
    "Cuisine": [
      "ModernAmerican",
      "SouthAfrican"
    ],
    "PrepTime": [
      "Under15"

}
        ```
